title: Ghostystacks AMA

replies.body:
Do you like pancakes?
If so why or why not?
Whats your favorite song?
What sports do you play if any? 
Opinions?
replies.body_tagged:

If so why or why not?
Whats your favorite song?

Opinions?

replies.body:
Yes of course ;}
cause i guess is the perfect breakfast 

Sweater Weather  

Soccer, basket, tennis and others xd 
(i like sports) 

I think that you are a very creative player (for the questions) and also if i am right, you are a good player. 


~Thanks, see you in the game ^^

replies.body:
Hey! How you been? 
My opinion of you, mmmh....you are very very op player, i like your skins and also i remember when we were talking on ts,about holidays and school xd 
~Thanks mr canadian c:
replies.body_tagged:
Hey! How you been? 
My opinion of you, mmmh....you are very very op player, i like your skins and also i remember when we were talking on ts,about holidays and school xd 
~Thanks mr canadian c:

replies.body:
Hey Dev! 
My thoughts.... i guess finishing well my school (this year),trying to enjoy myself living this life.I mean, i hope travel to other countries to know more about the world and also try to met with diferent kind of people. 

You are my dad in avicus xd 

Yes, of course and i have to say you thanks for the opportunity to be member again. I think that now i’m more active than before xd 

~Thanks ^~^

replies.body:
Why did you join TR?



What where you feeling during the match against Jala v TR, and your reaction when PSV got banned?
replies.body_tagged:
Why did you join TR?



What where you feeling during the match against Jala v TR, and your reaction when PSV got banned?

replies.body:
Hmm i didn't talk with you, but i suppose that you are a good player ;p Your nick is literally similar to a old friend (From ocn) 

~Thanks
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Because, i like the team, the members are good and confortables.Because i can practice my english skills actually xd and the principal thing was cause i was member before so dev knew about me.

Actually nothing xd, usually i don’t care if other player use cheats or something like that and i was supprised cause actomatically we won the group.

~Thanks
